divs: Sighting DetailsA friend and myself were lying down in the grass talking. We both were looking up at the sky when all of a sudden a bright object was comeing down very very fast. We thought it was a falling star but all of a sudden it stopped. It stayed stationary for awhile and then it went straight up very fast and disappeared. All we said to each other was "did you see what i saw?"
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: A object was falling down to earth
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Worcester
There were no other sightings in Worcester on or around July 12th 1961
